movies.title: The Hunt for the Boston Bombers
movies.originalTitle: Inside the Hunt for the Boston Bombers
movies.plot: In April 2013, chaos erupted in Boston near the finish line of one of the world's oldest and most prestigious marathons. It was the worst terrorist attack on the United States since 9/11 and led to one of the most extensive and public manhunts in American history. Now, as the one-year anniversary approaches, National Geographic Channel presents a special two-hour event, Inside the Hunt for the Boston Bombers.
movies.simplePlot: A recounting of the 2013 terrorist bombing of the Boston Marathon and its subsequent investigation and manhunt.

biography.bio: Bob Robinson III is an actor, known for The Hunt for the Boston Bombers (2014).
biography.name: Bob Robinson III

biography.bio: Kane Black was born on June 29, 1980 in Chico, California, USA. He is an actor and editor, known for The Guilty (2008), Fallout (2010) and Rollers (2010).
biography.name: Kane Black

biography.bio: DeAnna Cali Is an American Actor. Born in Flagstaff, Arizona to Father John M. Cali Jr, and mother Debbie Ann Cali. The family lived in Northern Arizona and eventually moved to Sedona and Cottonwood Az. DeAnna became involved with youth musical theater and Church productions at the early age of 4. When the family moved to Tempe, Arizona DeAnna's Mother Debbie, was diagnosed with Breast Cancer. She fought for 3 years, but ended up passing away in 2001 when DeAnna was only 16 years old. She got her first big break when she went to audition for a local Independent film. This was "Running on Empty Dreams" The director, Nitara Osbourne wanted her to read for the lead role, but ended up giving her two different roles in the film; Trisha Jameson the loan officer and the voice over for the Teacher.The dramatic scene between her and lead Actor Jose Rosete, won her "Best Dramatic Actress" in the Phoenix Film Festival for 2009. She was hand chosen personally by the Director to play Nicole Odom, who was a marathon victim in,"The Hunt for the Boston Bombers." The Netflix drama was filmed by National Geographic; the docudrama about The Boston Marathon. This showed her range as a dramatic actress again, making her way through the Industry as a professional powerhouse. DeAnna also Co-Hosted for a local TV show "Arizona Sports and Lifestyle Magazine" Highlighting the valley's Entertainment and Restaurants. Upon her move to Los Angeles, DeAnna Can be seen on ABC'S Prime time Show "Revenge", "The Goldberg's", and "The Mindy Project". She also filmed the Project Greenlight short "Don't Be Leary" with Director Sean Patrick Murphy who was the top 10 finalists of 2014. She continues to build on her craft by doing Equity Theater around the U.S. with various Theater Companies and Indie Feature films. DeAnna currently resides in Los Angeles California.
biography.name: DeAnna Cali

biography.bio: Jayme Clark is an actress, known for The Hunt for the Boston Bombers (2014).
biography.name: Jayme Clark

biography.bio: Birth Name: William Roland Connor. Height: 5'11". Mini Bio: William Connor was born in 1959 in Joliet,Illinois. His mother's name is Suzanne Phyllis Melander. His father, William Thomas Connor. He is an only child. Moved to Phoenix,AZ.in 1973 in High School and attended Alhambra High. Connor went on to major in Nursing in college and when not acting, is a Registered Nurse in multiple areas of the Hospital setting. It was the intensity of his medical career that motivated him to pursue an acting career with the intention and success of finding balance in his day to day influence on those he impacts.
biography.name: William 'Bill' Connor

biography.bio: Kyswan Diggs is an actor, known for Agoraphobia (2013), The Prescription (2013) and Disclosed Minds (2015).
biography.name: Kyswan Diggs

biography.bio: Jedediah Jones is an actor, known for Durant's Never Closes (2016), The Hunt for the Boston Bombers (2014) and Love the Way You Lie (2014).
biography.name: Jedediah Jones

biography.bio: Alexander Karavay was originally born in Chisinau, Moldova and moved with his parents and younger sister to Sacramento at the age of 9. As a teenager he was mesmerized by fantasy but his instincts to perform were stunted by his shyness. It wasn't until college that he channeled his imagination into the Theater with a stage debut at California State University, Sacramento in late 2011, whilst working on his B.A. and later performing for the community. In early 2013 he successfully auditioned out of a nation-wide search in San Francisco, Chicago, the South Eastern Theatre Conference, and 3 KCACTF regions for a spot in a 16 person conservatory to continue training at the Stella Adler Art of Acting Studio in Los Angeles - and further the frontier for his work. Inspired by the teachings of Jeff Perry, Kim Rubinstein, Alexandra Billings, Evelyn Case, David Razowsky, Monica Payne, and Stewart Pearce at the Steppenwolf West month long intensive at CSU Summer Arts 2013 - he has helped co-found the experimental Scrap Metal Theatre company with an inaugural performance of Fool For Love by Sam Shepard. The play was rehearsed and performed on a site specific location in the Mojave Desert in April of 2014. In early 2014 he also has filmed as John Lennon for the Lady Gaga: G.U.Y. (2014) music video and appeared in National Geographic's The Hunt for the Boston Bombers (2014) docudrama, filmed in Arizona. As of July 2014, he is a member and co-founder of the DogPile comedy sketch group.
biography.name: Alexander Karavay

biography.bio: Pete Kelly brings a rock and roll sensibility to his performances. Gritty, driven, with a hint of danger; (The 11th Aggression) nuanced and seductive, (Pale Trees) or heroic and in pursuit of justice, (Inside the Hunt for the Boston Bombers- Nat Geo Channel). Pete is also extremely comfortable as a spokesperson (Right Honda, Right Toyota and KIA of Scottsdale) in commercials (Visa, Rexona Deodorant,) and voice work (Pete is radio personality Pistol Pete on HOT 97.5/103.9). He is also an expert Drummer (Formerly in the 80's hair band "Kaiser").
biography.name: Pete Kelly

biography.bio: Stephen Kessen was born on July 1st 1989 in Cincinnati Ohio. Born and raised in Cincinnati, Stephen's passion for film started at a very early age and his career started taking off 8 years after his first film where he was an extra in Seabiscuit. Stephen studied film at Collins College in Phoenix Arizona where he was cast in several student productions and assisted behind the scenes on several projects including a documentary on bipolar disorder called up/down. He continues to reside in Tempe, Arizona and he continues to work on projects as they become available
biography.name: Stephen Kessen

biography.bio: L.T. Kidd is an actor, known for Soulman: The Movie (2011), The Hunt for the Boston Bombers (2014) and The Imposter (2012).
biography.name: L.T. Kidd

biography.bio: James Leatherman was born on a small dairy farm in Upstate New York. Starting in college at WJPZ Syracuse, he did voiceover work throughout New York and New England. After moving to Arizona in 2006, James shifted his attention to theatre and film, performing with Southwest Shakespeare Company and earning several awards in local film festivals. James is a vocal advocate for film production in Arizona, where he feels some of the brightest talent in the country can be found.
biography.name: James Leatherman

biography.bio: Jonathan Levenson is an actor, known for The Hunt for the Boston Bombers (2014) and Life Room (2009).
biography.name: Jonathan Levenson

biography.bio: Greg Lutz is known for his work on Tales from Old Town (2014), High Roads Low Roads and 600 Miles (2015).
biography.name: Greg Lutz

biography.bio: Carol Mayka is known for her work on Chameleon (2008), Double Life (2015) and The Hunt for the Boston Bombers (2014).
biography.name: Carol Mayka
